item.title: Life after the Synthetic Cell
item.description: Note: This is a old piece from about 2012 but I still like it. In mid-2010 headlines were created around the world when The J. Craig Venter Institute announced what they term the “assembly” of a self replicating cell with a chemically synthesized genome.
